plot outline: Balu (Pawan Kalyan) falls in love with a girl at first sight but can't find a way to get to know her. He can't believe his luck when she approaches him, because her hobby is collecting the autographs of people who do good things.They become friends after that. The challenges Balu has to face to tell her about his love form rest of the story.
title: Tholi Prema
plot: While Balu falls in love with Anu at first sight, she is unaware of his emotions. The difficulties that he needs to face to win her heart, form the rest of the story.

Balu (Pawan Kalyan) falls in love with a girl at first sight but can't find a way to get to know her. He can't believe his luck when she approaches him, because her hobby is collecting the autographs of people who do good things.They become friends after that. The challenges Balu has to face to tell her about his love form rest of the story.
